message.body: Stopping at wawa, want a coffee or anything?
Lucky's tucked in for the night. Eating/drinking/doing everything he's supposed to do, just fine!
I was literally JUST thinking if you!! I was going to just text you and say, "how's your boy doing?" ! :) great! He's a good boy! :) x
He so is! I can't wait to ride him. I left my lunge line at your place yesterday, sorry!

I know, I rolled it up cause it was on the ground ;) don't be sorry! :) have a great night ill talk to ya tomorrow. Did u want me to give you a lesson tomorrow or did u just want to kinda get on and wander around and just get a feel for him? Just Let me know whatever u want to do is fine :)
Can you do a lesson Monday after work, or is that a pain?
Shoot, sorry, I was eating dinner. I'm teaching Sam at 5:30 Monday, I'd just need to push her back a little, I can ask her :)
Ok, let me know! Either day is fine but a wander tomorrow would be good. Thanks!
